Course Introduction

"The Financial Terms column will provide you with explanations of commonly used financial terms in the finance industry, such as PMI, CPI, inflation, and more, enabling you to quickly understand and apply these financial terms. Each financial term comes with a simple example to make complex knowledge easier to comprehend!

Learn a new piece of financial knowledge every day and let's start learning!"
